description.bonds: Debt instruments issued as tokenized securities.

description.equities: Assets representing ownership in a company.
description.funds: Investment vehicles pooled by professional managers.
description.stablecoins: Digital assets pegged to a stable asset like USD.
description.tokenizeddeposits: Digital assets that represent a deposit of a traditional asset.

description.burn: Input the amount you wish to burn. Ensure you have the necessary permissions and sufficient balance in the selected wallet.
description.freeze: Input the amount you wish to freeze. Ensure the amount stays within the total balance of the selected wallet.
description.mint: Input the amount you wish to mint. Ensure the amount stays within the collateral limits.
description.top-up: Input the amount you wish to top up the underlying asset to.
description.update-collateral: Input the amount you wish to update the collateral to. Ensure the amount is bigger or equal to the current supply.
description.withdraw: Input the amount you wish to withdraw.

description.allow: Allow this user to perform transactions and interactions.
description.block: Prevent this user from performing any transactions or interactions.
description.burn: Permanently remove tokens from circulation to reduce supply.
description.disallow: Prevent this user from performing any transactions or interactions.
description.freeze: Temporarily restrict a user's access to their funds.
description.grant-role: Assign administrative permissions to a new user.
description.mature: Mature your bond and receive the underlying asset
description.mint: Issue new tokens to increase the asset's circulating supply.
description.pause: Temporarily halt all transactions and interactions for this asset.
description.top-up: Add more underlying asset to your bond
description.unblock: Allow this user to perform transactions and interactions again.
description.unpause: Resume transactions and interactions for this asset.
description.update-collateral: Adjust the collateral backing the stablecoin to reflect current requirements.
description.withdraw: Withdraw underlying asset from your bond

description.bonds: A bond manager can reduce the total supply through bond redemption at maturity or early repurchase programs.
description.equities: An equity manager can reduce the total supply of shares through a buyback program or capital reduction.
description.funds: A fund manager can reduce the total supply through fund redemption at maturity or early repurchase programs.
description.stablecoins: A supply manager can burn existing stablecoins, provided sufficient collateral is available.
description.tokenizeddeposits: A supply manager can burn existing tokenized deposits, provided sufficient collateral is available.

description.bonds: A bond manager can issue new bonds through primary issuance or tap issuance with defined face value and maturity.
description.cryptocurrencies: A token manager can mint new tokens according to the tokenomics plan and emission schedule.
description.equities: An equity manager can issue new shares through various mechanisms like rights issues, private placements, or stock splits.
description.funds: A fund manager can issue new funds through primary issuance or tap issuance with defined face value and maturity.
description.stablecoins: A supply manager can mint new stablecoins, provided sufficient collateral is available.
description.tokenizeddeposits: A supply manager can mint new tokenized deposits, provided sufficient collateral is available.

description.stablecoins: A supply manager needs to refresh and verify the collateral backing the stablecoin. This ensures the asset remains fully collateralized at all times.
description.tokenizeddeposits: A supply manager needs to refresh and verify the collateral backing the tokenized deposit. This ensures the asset remains fully collateralized at all times.

fields.proven-collateral-info: The amount of collateral that has been proven to be held by the token
fields.required-collateral-threshold-info: The amount of collateral that must be proven
fields.total-burned-info: Amount of tokens permanently removed from circulation
fields.total-holders-info: Amount of addresses currently holding the assets
fields.total-supply-info: The total supply of the asset

topinfo-description.bond: Digital bonds represent traditional fixed-income securities securely on blockchain, backed by real-world collateral. They combine blockchain transparency with predictable returns, redemption at maturity, and automated yield distribution. This Bond asset ensures secure issuance, precise maturity management, comprehensive compliance capabilities, and investor-friendly redemption processes tailored specifically for financial institutions.
topinfo-description.cryptocurrency: CryptoCurrency assets are customizable digital instruments offering controlled minting, robust security, and full regulatory compliance, ideal for institutional use. They streamline financial operations through programmable transactions, enhanced transparency, and integrated meta-transactions for improved usability. Key features include role-based access management, secure issuance, and easy integration into institutional payment processes.
topinfo-description.equity: Equity assets digitize traditional equity securities, combining advanced blockchain capabilities with robust governance and compliance tools. Designed for institutional investors, they offer secure equity issuance, shareholder voting rights, detailed access controls, and regulatory compliance mechanisms. This asset simplifies equity management, enhances transparency, and ensures secure investor participation.
topinfo-description.fund: Fund assets digitize investment fund shares, offering automated management fee collection, investor governance, and comprehensive regulatory compliance. Ideal for financial institutions, they streamline administrative processes, ensure transparent fee management, and enable secure investor voting. The contract provides strong security, customizable fund attributes, and enhanced operational efficiency.
topinfo-description.stablecoin: Stablecoins are digital currencies designed to maintain a stable value by being backed by real-world assets or reserves. They offer the advantages of digital assets — such as speed, transparency, and programmability — while avoiding price volatility typically associated with cryptocurrencies. This StableCoin contract ensures every token issued is fully collateralized, providing institutions with secure, auditable, and reliable digital money management. Key features include collateral-backed issuance, comprehensive role-based controls, robust pause mechanisms, and regulatory compliance capabilities.
topinfo-description.tokenizeddeposit: Tokenized Deposits digitally represent traditional banking deposits, providing financial institutions with enhanced security, real-time transparency, and rigorous compliance capabilities. Key features include customizable allowlists, custodial oversight, robust role-based management, and integrated meta-transactions, simplifying institutional deposit administration.

topinfo-title.cryptocurrency: A customizable and secure digital asset
topinfo-title.fund: Digital asset for institutional fund management
topinfo-title.stablecoin: A secure and collateralized digital currency
topinfo-title.tokenizeddeposit: Secure and compliant digital deposit management
